lines.text: Let me tell you about us. I'm gonna need a working woman; that's you. You're gonna need a broad shoulder; that's me. I like you, Iris, just about as much as I love you. And you know what? We're gonna do just fine together. And a man could drown in your blue eyes.
A girl's best friend is her mama. At least that's what it says on the greeting cards.
Three people in bed are one too many for me.
Why do they call it a good cry? All it does is make you look like hell. And what's missing is still missing.
